generated_json.title: History of present illness
content: The patient is a postoperative patient status three weeks after knee surgery. She reports that the surgical site is healing well and is currently stable. She notes that the wound was previously managed with a wound vac. There is no drainage noted at this time. The patient is tolerating the recovery process well and reports no pain or complications. She is continuing physical therapy and is compliant with care instructions. The physician confirms good progress, noting improved range of motion with the knee flexing to approximately 100 degrees and no acute distress. The patient is scheduled for staple and suture removal today. No new symptoms or concerns were reported.
generated_json.instruction:
Provide a detailed summary of the patient's current illness based on their report. Include a thorough description of symptoms, noting their onset, duration, and severity. Discuss any changes or developments in symptoms since onset and identify factors that may exacerbate or relate to these symptoms, such as specific activities, foods, or medications. Document any prior treatments or remedies the patient has attempted, noting their efficacy. Describe how these symptoms impact the patientâ€™s daily activities, overall well-being, and quality of life. Capture information about any individuals mentioned by the patient, specifying their relationship and any pertinent interactions or conversations related to the illness.

Ensure that no information regarding the treatment plan is included.
